name: Eldritch Blast
description: Ranged spell attack that does 1d10 force damage on a hit

name: Message
description: Whisper a message to one creature

name: Charm Person
description: Creature must make a wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for an hour.

name: Feather Fall
description: Choose 5 creatures that will take no fall damage if they land before the spell ends.

name: Flaming Sphere
description: Creatures ending their turn within the 5ft sphere must roll a Dexterity saving throw to avoid damage.

name: Blink
description: Roll a d20 at the end of each turn, if 11 or higher, you vanish into the Ethereal Plane.
